name: Introduction to Database Systems
title: MEAS EECS 339-0-20 Introduction to Database Systems
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Students must have completed EECS 214, and either EECS 213 or EECS 205, or have graduate standing to register for this course. Students must also be familiar with C or C++ programing, as well as Unix.
